metadata.name: LightCard by i3x - Energy Tier
metadata.description: i3x Membership NFT LightCard, backed by digitalized and physical art, holders will allow participation in VIP token offerings at phase 3 release by invite only, allow DAO participation as a phase 3 Founder, participate as a minority founder for DAO community reward incentives, will allow Membership holders to purchase digital art NFTs from internal artists,  will include VIP services from within 3D Earth and the Metaverse, VIP access into frequency-driven virtual wellness facilitates, VR healing lounges, virtual compounds/condominiums for private meet ups, LightCard VIP for musical performances, virtual concerts, fashion shows, content release parties, and posh branding events, as well as extended VIP treatments into real-life regenerative communities and quantum healing facilities/technologies from around the globe. All members will be allowed to work with our team of healers and enlightenment coaches.  Difference: Founder will own less of the DAO rewards and are at a phase 3 tier for DAO participation.
